fact_check_explanation_title: We don’t know exactly how many NHS workers have died from Covid-19
fact_check_explanation_summary: Figures on the number of NHS workers who have died from the new coronavirus are incomplete.

fact_check_explanation_title: Animals and the origins of the new coronavirus
fact_check_explanation_summary: It is thought that the new coronavirus originated from bats and was transmitted to humans through another animal.

fact_check_explanation_title: It’s likely that over 100,000 people have entered the UK since the lockdown began
fact_check_explanation_summary: Government estimates on arrivals are opaque, but recent figures suggest 100,000 is an underestimate.

fact_check_explanation_title: Hydroxychloroquine is not used as a treatment for radiation sickness
fact_check_explanation_summary: There isn’t yet reliable evidence that this drug, or chloroquine, cures Covid-19 patients either.

fact_check_explanation_title: It’s not right that you’re more likely to drown than die of Covid-19 if you’re under 60 with no health problems
fact_check_explanation_summary: It was claimed on Question Time that you are more likely to drown than die of Covid-19 if you are under 60 with no health conditions.

fact_check_explanation_title: This viral UK Facebook post claiming 31 million job losses probably refers to the USA
fact_check_explanation_summary: A viral post shared by a UK Facebook user claims 31 million people have lost jobs in the last five weeks. This isn’t correct for the UK.

fact_check_explanation_title: Nurse pay up over the past few years but down on 2010
fact_check_explanation_summary: Matt Hancock claimed nurse salaries had risen significantly in recent years. These increases don’t counterbalance falls in real terms pay over the past decade.

fact_check_explanation_title: German police cannot vaccinate people by force
fact_check_explanation_summary: A post on Facebook wrongly claims that German police can come into homes and forcibly vaccinate people.

fact_check_explanation_title: Currently, people in independent living housing aren’t automatically eligible for coronavirus testing
fact_check_explanation_summary: Testing for asymptomatic people is currently only available for people in regulated care homes and in the NHS.

fact_check_explanation_title: Far more people have died of Covid-19 in the UK than in Japan
fact_check_explanation_summary: Far more people have died of Covid-19 in the UK than in Japan, but we don’t yet know why

fact_check_explanation_title: No, Shamima Begum is not back in the UK
fact_check_explanation_summary: There's no evidence to suggest this is true.

fact_check_explanation_title: We don’t know the true Covid-19 survival rate yet
fact_check_explanation_summary: We don’t have a good idea of how many people have had Covid-19 yet, so don’t know how many have survived it.
